SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Ashley Schutjer’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I want students to believe they can accomplish any goal or dream they make for themselves…”

– Mrs. Ashley Schutjer, Elementary Educator @PropelSchools @misericordiau https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/students-believe-accomplish-any-goal-dream/
